title: Introducing: NOVAA
content:
Emerging singer / producer NOVAA cropped up on my radar a few months back with a brilliant collaboration EP with Moglii – and is now stepping out solo with her most complete sound to date.

Gradually dropping tracks from a nine track EP titled Stolen Peaches expected at the end of September, her take on Purity Ring meets Lorde-esque electro-pop is utterly unique and addictive. Super slick production, and a vocal to die for, all bundled up with one of the most coherent visual aesthetics around, NOVAA has all the makings of an artist to truly believe in. Simply put, these are emotionally fraught, twisted pop songs – and they’re absolutely brilliant. Check out SEX and HANDS below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
